evidence: “Please select from the below or give me a detailed description of what’s happening. Any error messages you’ve seen or steps you’ve already tried would be really helpful.”

P1_SEV1_MISHANDLING.reasoning: There is no explicit severity marker (P1/SEV1/Critical) and no indication of outage/production-down impact in the provided content, so mishandling cannot be evidenced.
